Name: Kobe International Conference Center
Address: 6-9-1 Minatojima-nakamachi, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo 650-0046, Japan
Why it is good: W3C TPAC 2025 conference location
Dietary notes: Conference catering available
Tips: Main venue for all TPAC sessions

Name: Kobe Portopia Hotel
Address: 6-10-1 Minatojima-nakamachi, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0046, Japan
Why it is good: Official TPAC 2025 hotel with premium amenities and conference facilities
Dietary notes: Multiple restaurants with various dietary options
Tips: Connected to conference center - premium conference hotel

Name: Ariston Hotel
Address: 6 Chome-1 Minatojima Nakamachi, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0046, Japan
Why it is good: Official TPAC 2025 hotel option in Port Island
Dietary notes: Hotel restaurant and room service available
Tips: Close to conference venue

Name: Centurion Hotel & Spa Vintage Kobe
Address: 1 Chome-1-6 Minatojima, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0045, Japan
Why it is good: Official TPAC 2025 hotel with spa facilities
Dietary notes: Hotel dining options available
Tips: Spa facilities for conference relaxation

Name: Soutetsu Fresa Inn Kobe-Sannomiya
Address: 5 Chome-2-3 Asahidori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 651-0095, Japan
Why it is good: Official TPAC 2025 hotel in central Sannomiya district
Dietary notes: Breakfast available - near many restaurants
Tips: Central location with easy transport to venue

Name: Kobe Luminous Hotel Sannomiya
Address: 92 Edomachi, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0033, Japan
Why it is good: Official TPAC 2025 hotel in downtown Kobe
Dietary notes: Hotel amenities and nearby dining
Tips: Downtown location with shopping and dining

Name: Hotel SUI Kobe Sannomiya by ABEST
Address: 2 Chome-1-20 Nakayamatedori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0004, Japan
Why it is good: Official TPAC 2025 hotel in historic foreign district
Dietary notes: Hotel restaurant and room service
Tips: Located in atmospheric Nakayamate district

Name: Hotel Monterey Kobe
Address: 2 Chome-11-13 Shimoyamatedori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0011, Japan
Why it is good: Official TPAC 2025 hotel with classic European style
Dietary notes: Hotel dining and bar facilities
Tips: Classic hotel with traditional service

Name: Bifteck Kawamura Sannomiya
Address: 4 Chome-5-13 Kanocho, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0001, Japan
Why it is good: World's finest Kobe beef restaurant - Chef Kawamura personally selects each A5 grade cut
Dietary notes: Limited vegetarian options - primarily beef focused
Tips: Reservations essential weeks in advance - budget ¥20000-30000+ per person

Name: Steak Misono
Address: 1-1-2 Shimoname-dori, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo 650-0011, Japan
Why it is good: Birthplace of teppanyaki - authentic Kobe beef with historic atmosphere and show cooking
Dietary notes: Good seafood and vegetarian options available
Tips: Budget ¥8000-15000 per person - lunch sets offer better value than dinner

Name: Mouriya Honten
Address: 2-1-17 Shimoname-dori, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo 650-0011, Japan
Why it is good: Historic steakhouse since 1885 - pioneers of Kobe beef with traditional atmosphere
Dietary notes: Excellent seafood options and vegetarian dishes available
Tips: Lunch sets excellent value ¥3000-8000 vs dinner ¥10000+ - try the sirloin

Name: Ganko Ramen
Address: Sannomiya Center Gai, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo, Japan
Why it is good: Authentic tonkotsu ramen with 12+ hour slow-cooked broth - perfect comfort food
Dietary notes: Some vegetarian broth options and chicken-based ramen available
Tips: Quick service perfect for conference breaks - order at vending machine with pictures

Name: Sake Bar Yamashina
Address: Sannomiya area, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo, Japan
Why it is good: Local Nada district sake with expert guidance - perfect for networking and cultural immersion
Dietary notes: Traditional izakaya dishes complement sake perfectly
Tips: Start early before 20:00 - let staff guide sake selection - pour for others not yourself

Name: Kobe Port Tower
Address: 5-5 Hatobacho, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo 650-0042, Japan
Why it is good: Iconic red tower with 360-degree harbor views - perfect conference break spot
Dietary notes: Cafe and restaurant options available at base
Tips: Open 9:00-21:00 - ¥700 admission - less crowded in morning

Name: Meriken Park
Address: Hatobacho, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo 650-0042, Japan
Why it is good: Beautiful waterfront park perfect for morning jogs walking meetings and evening decompression
Dietary notes: Convenience stores and restaurants nearby
Tips: Free and open 24/7 - best times early morning or evening - can be windy near harbor

Name: Sannomiya District
Address: Sannomiya Station area, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo
Why it is good: Main commercial hub with dining and shopping - highest concentration of restaurants and bars
Dietary notes: Every type of cuisine available from street food to fine dining
Tips: Get Port Liner day pass - peak dinner 19:00-21:00 so go earlier or later

Name: Kitano Foreign District
Address: Kitano-cho, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo
Why it is good: Historic Western-style houses from 1800s with stunning harbor views
Dietary notes: Cafes and restaurants throughout district
Tips: Perfect afternoon conference break - comfortable shoes for hillside walking

Name: SAKU
Address: 6-10-1 Minatojima Nakamachi, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0046, Japan
Why it is good: High-end Japanese dining in Portopia Hotel with fresh seasonal ingredients
Dietary notes: Can accommodate dietary restrictions with advance notice
Tips: Hotel location offers refined atmosphere - reservations recommended

Name: Teppanyaki Grill Tajima
Address: 6-10-1 Minatojima Nakamachi, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0046, Japan
Why it is good: Premium teppanyaki experience in Portopia Hotel with Kobe beef specialties
Dietary notes: Excellent seafood and vegetarian teppanyaki options
Tips: Hotel setting perfect for business entertainment - watch skilled chefs at work

Name: Seafood Dining 1932
Address: 1-1-6 Minatojima, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0045, Japan
Why it is good: Fresh seafood dining on 9th floor with harbor views from Centurion Hotel
Dietary notes: Excellent variety of fresh fish and seafood preparations
Tips: Harbor views enhance dining experience - good for sunset dinners

Name: Gennaio
Address: 1-7-20 Nakayamatedori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0004, Japan
Why it is good: Authentic Italian cuisine in historic foreign district with traditional preparations
Dietary notes: Italian menu can accommodate various dietary needs
Tips: Located in atmospheric foreign district - perfect for romantic or business dinners

Name: Kakurega Sakaba MIA
Address: 2-11-6 Kitanagasadori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0012, Japan
Why it is good: Hidden sake bar with extensive selection and authentic izakaya atmosphere
Dietary notes: Traditional izakaya dishes complement sake perfectly
Tips: Hidden location adds to authentic experience - follow Instagram for updates

Name: Sushi to shi
Address: 3-2-2 Nakayamatedori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0004, Japan
Why it is good: High-quality sushi restaurant with fresh local fish and traditional preparations
Dietary notes: Fresh fish preparations with some vegetarian options available
Tips: Reservations essential - omakase course recommended for authentic experience

Name: Sushi Restaurant Juraku
Address: 2-16-2 Shimoyamatedori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0011, Japan
Why it is good: Traditional sushi restaurant with skilled chef and fresh daily selections
Dietary notes: Focus on fresh fish but can accommodate some dietary preferences
Tips: Intimate counter seating provides authentic sushi experience - try chef's recommendations

Name: Minatoken Sannomiya Kokashita
Address: 1-31-35 Kitanagasadori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0012, Japan
Why it is good: Popular underground ramen shop known for rich tonkotsu broth and authentic atmosphere
Dietary notes: Limited vegetarian options - traditional pork-based broth
Tips: Underground location adds authentic ramen experience - expect queues during peak hours

Name: Ramen Ichiren
Address: 1-6-20 Nakayamatedori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0004, Japan
Why it is good: Chuka soba specialist with refined clear broth and high-quality ingredients
Dietary notes: Some lighter broth options available
Tips: Instagram-worthy presentation - 2nd floor location - reservations recommended

Name: Mendo Shuhari Sannomiya
Address: 2-11-27 Sannomiyacho, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0021, Japan
Why it is good: Artisanal ramen with focus on premium ingredients and refined techniques
Dietary notes: Varied menu with different broth styles including vegetarian options
Tips: Located in shopping center - modern approach to traditional ramen - highly rated

Name: Starbucks Reserve Kobe
Address: 2-2 Higashikawasakicho 1-chome, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo 650-0044, Japan
Why it is good: Premium Starbucks Reserve with coffee roasting theater and harbor views
Dietary notes: Premium pastries and light meals available
Tips: Peak times 11:00-14:00 - outdoor seating has best harbor views

Name: UCC Coffee Museum Cafe
Address: 6-6-2 Minatojima-nakamachi, Chuo-ku, Kobe-shi, Hyogo 650-0046, Japan
Why it is good: Japanese coffee culture education with expert preparation and museum
Dietary notes: Light snacks and traditional Japanese coffee preparations
Tips: Quiet atmosphere perfect for calls - museum adds cultural value

Name: The Old England
Address: 1-13-7 Nakayamatedori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0004, Japan
Why it is good: Authentic British pub culture with genuine British food in historic foreign district
Dietary notes: Traditional pub food - fish and chips bangers and mash
Tips: English-speaking staff - cash preferred - call ahead for larger groups

Name: Jesus Pizza
Address: 2-18-8 Nakayamatedori, Chuo Ward, Kobe, Hyogo 650-0004, Japan
Why it is good: Beloved local pizza spot with creative combinations and casual atmosphere
Dietary notes: Vegetarian options available - can modify for dietary needs
